short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mask your deployment stages with different border colors to never again use the wrong stage by accident.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark different deployment stages with different color borders to always know which stage you are on right now.
No need to implement anything in your code. Url matching.
